name: [space] (migiesmith, rbrown117, andreww3495)
description:
A VR game set in space where the player collects loot in procedural ships. Loot can then be converted at their own ship into weapons and/or ammo. The objective of the game is to collect the black box during the levels and to return to the main ship to expand your arsenal.

An HTC Vive is required to play.

This was developed for a final year project by a small team of programmers.
